from pandas import read_csv
from matplotlib import pyplot
# load
series = read_csv(' monthly-car-sales.csv' , header=0, index_col=0)
# summarize shape
print(series.shape)
# plot
pyplot.plot(series)
pyplot.xticks([])
pyplot.show()
Listing 11.49: Example of loading and plotting the monthly car sales dataset.
Running the example Ô¨Årst summarizes the shape of the loaded dataset. The dataset has 9
years, or 108 observations. We will use the last year or 12 observations as the test set.
(108, 1)
